fields.description: Amazon does not support ARNs in all policies, but it would help our implementation (see related ticket) if Eucalyptus did.
fields.summary: Add support for ARNs in policies for all services

comments.body:
[~sjones],

I found the following resources that related to supported ARNs for each service we support in AWS:

* http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/iam-policy-structure.html#EC2_ARN_Format
* http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/ec2-supported-iam-actions-resources.html
* http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AutoScaling/latest/DeveloperGuide/IAM.html#AutoScaling_ARN_Format
* http://docs.aws.amazon.com/ElasticLoadBalancing/latest/DeveloperGuide/UsingIAM.html#ElasticLoadBalancin_ARN_Format
* http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/s3-arn-format.html
* http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/PasswordPolicyPermission.html
* http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/DeveloperGuide/UsingIAM.html#CloudWatch_ARN_Format
* http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/using-iam-template.html#d0e3988
* http://docs.aws.amazon.com/amazonswf/latest/developerguide/swf-dev-iam.html

I can think of a couple that we may not follow - for example:

* We don't support [IAM Policy Variables|http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/PolicyVariables.html] (I think?)
* We don't support S3 bucket policies yet, but this ARN should work {{arn:aws:s3:*}}
* SWF isn't production ready (correct?)

But I wasn't sure if there were any other differences where we do/don't follow AWS based upon the documentation above.  Would you mind reviewing those links, and filling in the blanks?  I will create a doc ticket based upon the information provided.  Thanks for your help here.

[~sjones],

Also, do we support principle restrictions for STS?

* http://docs.aws.amazon.com/STS/latest/UsingSTS/DisablingTokenPermissions.html

[~hspencer], this change is not for AWS compatibility, it is in support of eucalyptus specific policies controlling cross-account permissions. SWF is currently used to implement CloudFormation and is disabled for non-system users. There is no change to the tokens service for this issue. Example ARNs by service can be found here:

http://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/aws-arns-and-namespaces.html

Fixed.

Eucalyptus Version: {{4.2.0-0.0.24039.713.20151013gite09159a.el6}}

*Steps*

# Set up 3 Eucalyptus 4.2 (4.2.0-0.0.24039.713.20151013gite09159a.el6) clouds with Eucalyptus DNS enabled
#* [hspencer-280|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint-4.1/280/] (upgraded from 4.1.2 to 4.2.0)
#* [hspencer-1757|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Master/1757/]
#* [hspencer-1733|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Master/1733/]
# Set up federated cloud using all three regions:
{code}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# cat federated-region-setup.json
{
    "Regions": [

            "CertificateFingerprint": "BB:80:BA:68:93:AB:B6:A5:68:97:5B:D4:A7:A7:C2:D6:F6:09:CF:6C:27:57:86:16:81:1B:1C:E9:02:7D:11:83",
            "CertificateFingerprintDigest": "SHA-256",

                    ],

            ]
        },

}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euctl region --region euca-admin@future
region.region_enable_ssl = true
region.region_name = future
region.region_ssl_ciphers = RSA:DSS:ECDSA:TLS_EMPTY_RENEGOTIATION_INFO_SCSV:!NULL:!EXPORT:!EXPORT1024:!MD5:!DES:!RC4
region.region_ssl_default_cas = true
region.region_ssl_protocols = TLSv1.2
region.region_ssl_verify_hostnames = false

# Created 'development-operations' account under 'future' region:
{code}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euare-accountcreate -w development-operations > .euca/devops-admin.ini --region euca-admin@future

[root@g-26-03 ~]# euare-accountlist --region euca-admin@future

(eucalyptus)imaging	000153229002

{code}
# Created ELB:
{code}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# eulb-describe-lbs --show-long --region devops-admin@future
LOAD_BALANCER	devops-lb	devops-lb-001827830003.lb.c-09.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com			{interval=30,target=TCP:80,timeout=5,healthy-threshold=3,unhealthy-threshold=3}	ds2				{protocol=HTTP,lb-port=80,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80}					{owner-alias=000188098072,group-name=euca-internal-001827830003-devops-lb}		2015-10-18T17:22:23.778Z	internet-facing
{code}
# Downloaded creds for 'admin' user of '(eucalyptus)loadbalancing' account, then listed roles:
{code}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euare-useraddkey -w admin --as-account '(eucalyptus)loadbalancing' > .euca/elb-admin.ini --region euca-admin@future

[root@g-26-03 ~]# euare-rolelistbypath --region elb-admin@future
arn:aws:iam::000188098072:role/loadbalancing/LoadbalancingServiceAdministrator
arn:aws:iam::000188098072:role/internal/loadbalancer/loadbalancer-vm-001827830003-devops-lb

[root@g-26-03 ~]# euare-rolelistpolicies -r LoadbalancingServiceAdministrator --region elb-admin@future -v
LoadbalancingServiceAdministrator
{
  "Statement":[
   {
    "Effect": "Allow",
    "Action": [ "ec2:*KeyPair*", "ec2:*SecurityGroup*", "ec2:*Instances" ],
    "Resource": [ "arn:aws:ec2::000188098072:key-pair/*",
                  "arn:aws:ec2::000188098072:security-group/*",
                  "arn:aws:ec2::000188098072:instance/*" ]
   },
   {
    "Effect": "Allow",
    "Action": [ "autoscaling:*" ],
    "Resource": [ "arn:aws:autoscaling::000188098072:autoScalingGroup:*" ]
   }
  ]
}
IsTruncated: false
{code}
